posts.title: Synonymes
posts.excerpt: Yoav, a young Israeli, turns up in Paris, hopeful that France and French will save him from the madness of his country.

posts._title: Makoto Satô – Agano ni ikiru AKA Living on the River Agano (1992)
posts.title: Agano ni ikiru
posts.excerpt: Quote:In 1964, a chemical factory in Niigata Prefecture dumped mercury into the Agano River, the beginning of a manmade tragedy that would affect locals for years to come. Mercury poisoning led to high occurrences of Minamata disease, a neurological syndrome that causes severe physical and psychological ailments and death. Sato Makoto and his crew of …

posts._title: Rudolf Thome – Supergirl – Das Mädchen von den Sternen (1971)
posts.title: Supergirl – Das Mädchen von den Sternen
posts.excerpt: Synopsis: Playboy Charly is picking up a young woman on the freeway – she is only wearing an orange overall and wants to go to Washington. Charly takes her with him to Munich, introducing her to his friend author Evers. Since Evers is negotiating with a US film producer about the rights to his novel, …

posts.title: Fragment of Seeking
posts.excerpt: Quote:Harrington plays a young man desperately seeking out the fleeting image of a female companion, and though he never quite catches her, he discovers much more through the surreal explorations of his own sexuality. Made a year before Kenneth Anger’s Fireworks, the films contain some similarities in their treatment of homoerotic themes, though Fragment is …

posts.title: 99 River Street
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Having lost his heavyweight championship match, boxer Ernie Driscoll now drives a taxi for a living and earns the scorn of his nagging wife, Pauline, who blames him for her lack of social status. Involved with jewel thief Victor Rawlins, Pauline is murdered by him when she impedes his ability to fence the jewels. Blamed …

posts.title: The Long Riders
posts.excerpt: Walter Hill’s first attempt at revisiting the history of the West… Here he retells the story of the James brothers in their raids with the Younger brothers without the romantic aura of the films of Henry King and Nicholas Ray. The parts of the brothers are played by the Carradine brothers and the Keach brothers …

posts._title: George Fitzmaurice & Harry d’Abbadie d’Arrast – Raffles (1930)
posts.title: Raffles
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:A distinguished English gentleman has a secret life–he is the notorious jewel thief the press has dubbed “The Amateur Cracksman”. When he meets a woman and falls in love he decides to “retire” from that life, but an old friend comes to him with a predicament that entails him committing one last job.

posts._title: Lamberto Bava & Mario Bava – “I giochi del diavolo” La Venere d’Ille AKA The Venus of Ille (1979)
posts.title: “I giochi del diavolo” La Venere d’Ille
posts.excerpt: Wealthy landowner Mr. De Peyhorrade uncovers a bronze statue of Venus on his property. Afterwards, De Peyhorrade asks an antique expert, named Matthew, from another village to examine the statue and confirm its wealth. Upon arrival, Matthew is striken with love by Clara, Mr. De Peyhorrade’s daughter-in-law, who bears an uncanny resemblance to the statue.

posts._title: Frank Wisbar – Hunde, wollt ihr ewig leben AKA Stalingrad-Dogs, Do You Want to Live Forever (1959)
posts.title: Hunde, wollt ihr ewig leben
posts.excerpt: Synopsis:Set just outside Stalingrad in the winter of 1942, this compelling wartime drama tells the tale of a contingent of German soldiers caught in a Russian vise. Headed by Gen. Paulus (Wilhelm Borchert), the other officers and foot soldiers are slowly surrounded by Russian troops on the offensive. The battles that ensue as a result …
posts.titleEnglish: Stalingrad-Dogs, Do You Want to Live Forever

posts._title: Bong Joon Ho – Gisaengchung AKA Parasite (2019) (HD)
posts.title: Gisaengchung
posts.excerpt: Quote:Ki-taek’s family of four is close, but fully unemployed, with a bleak future ahead of them. The son Ki-woo is recommended by his friend, a student at a prestigious university, for a well-paid tutoring job, spawning hopes of a regular income. Carrying the expectations of all his family, Ki-woo heads to the Park family home …
